conclusion: Analyze forces to determine maximum force F without separating blocks.
Block A is on top of block B, and force F is applied horizontally to block B.
Weight of A is 10 N and normal force from B is 10 N.
Maximum static friction force between A and B is 1 N.
Weight of B is 20 N and normal force on B by the ground is 30 N.
Frictional force between B and the ground is 3 N.
Maximum force F that keeps A and B together is 1 N.
Maximum value of F should not exceed 1 N to keep A and B stationary.
